Release Notes for

AT32F402_405 Firmware Library Drivers

V2.0.7-2025/06/25

1.      CRM

l  Modified bit field ¡°adc14rst¡± to ¡°tmr14rst¡±.

2.      CAN

l  Modified definitions of some register bit fields, with 14 filter banks only, and deleted redundant definitions.

3.      Updated some notes.

 

V2.0.6-2025/01/20

1.      PWC

l  Updated LDO output level settings, removed LDO configuration option ¡°PWC_LDO_OUTPUT_1V0¡± and added ¡°PWC_LDO_OUTPUT_1V1¡±

2.      TMR

l  Updated ¡°tmr_brk_filter_value_set()¡± function, and modified bit field ¡°bkf¡± to ¡°brkf¡±.

3.      Updated some notes.

 

V2.0.5-2024/12/13

1.      CAN

l  Updated ¡°can_transmit_cancel()¡± function writing to avoid cross-mailbox interference due to misoperation.

2.      USB

l  Updated ¡°usb_hch_halt()¡± function in host mode and improved channel halt processing flow.

l  Updated ¡°usb_hc_enable()¡± function in host mode to ensure that its original state is cleared when enabling the corresponding channel.

l  Updated ¡°usb_host_disable()¡± function in host mode, and updated process of disabling channels to avoid inadvertently opening the remaining channels.

3.      SPI

l  Updated frequency calculation method in the ¡°i2s_init()¡± function, and fixed the error caused by calculation value overflow.

4.      ERTC

l  Updated ¡°ertc_wakeup_enable()¡± function, and corrected the use of parameters.

l  Updated ¡°ertc_wait_update()¡± function, and standardized how this function is written to work across all series.

5.      Updated some notes.

 

V2.0.4-2024/08/08

1.      PWC

l  Updated ¡°pwc_voltage_regulate_set()¡± function, and removed ¡°PWC_REGULATOR_LOW_POWER¡± setting.

2.      QSPI

l  Added ¡°qspi_auto_ispc_enable()¡± function for bus input clock phase matching.

l  Revised FIFO depth definition from ¡°QSPI_DMA_FIFO_THOD_WORD32¡± to ¡°QSPI_DMA_FIFO_THOD_WORD24¡±.

l  Updated ¡°qspi_flag_clear()¡± function writing, and fixed AC6 compilation problems.

3.      SCFG

l  Adjusted the type of return value of ¡°scfg_sram_operr_status_get()¡± function from ¡°error_status¡± to ¡°flag_status¡±.

4.      USART

l  Updated ¡°usart_init()¡± function and revised UART7/UART8 clock source.

5.      USB

l  Updated ¡°usb_hc_enable()¡± function in host mode, and fixed the enumeration issue of some devices.

l  Updated ¡°usb_host_disable()¡± function in host mode, and fixed the issue that channels might not close properly in DMA mode.

l  Revised parameters in ¡°usb_read_packet()¡± function, and fixed AC6 compilation problems.

6.      Updated some notes.

 

V2.0.3-2024/01/05

1.      Updated USB driver timeout handling.

2.      Adjusted USART DE line polarity ¡°usart_de_polarty_set()¡± function.

3.      Removed the configuration of serial signal as infrared modulation signal source.

4.      Updated some notes.

 

V2.0.2-2023/10/26

1.      Added ¡°interrupt_flag_get()¡± function to each of the IP sections.

 

V2.0.1-2023/09/28

1.      Updated USB driver.

 

V2.0.0-2023/08/18

1.      Initial release.
